text: Lyubovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Uslinsky Selsoviet, Sterlitamaksky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 88 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 39 km from Sterlitamak, 11 km from Verkhniye Usly. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlitamaksky District
title: Lyubovka, Republic of Bashkortostan
